document.full_text: a blogger sued for defamation over comments posted on an internet message board is not entitled to the same protections as a journalist, the new jersey supreme court ruled on tuesday.
document.title: new jersey court denies blogger shield protection
lines_and_colors: a blogger sued for defamation over comments posted on an internet message board is not entitled to the same protections as a journalist, the new jersey supreme court ruled on tuesday.
